item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“kedonot1, post:13, topic:250149”]What the hell are you talking about.
Are you retarded?
Ok then. If fighting isn’t coded then how is talking coded, messaging, friends, teleporting?
It’s coded where? On a piece of paper?
Idiot.
Also, i bet ur using Czer. Czer Sucks, maybe thats what you using. Get Delta.

[ CLOSE! ][/quote]

You make me sick sir…

What are YOU talking about?

First, you spelled Czar wrong. Second, DeltaScape sucks, as most people like you probably just take the source and change the name and say its yours. Also, did you know DeltaScape is ALSO wL? Meaning it is an unstable piece of crap too.

Sorry, but it is the truth, and it is really tiring seeing you spam every topic I see…

As for the topic, try searching NPC Retaliate on the Search bar, google, or another site.
